To construct a building. Do Vijayam Kummu Rayu
Orders are hereby issued to approve the following conditions.
1. The building shall be constructed exactly as permitted in the approved copy plans
2. No changes shall be made to the approved plans without the written permission of the Panchayat Secretary.
3. The approved plans shall be produced on request by the officers of the Gram Panchayat.
4. The height of the boundary wall shall not be more than 2 meters above the street level when adjoining a public street.
5. No encroachment shall be made on the roadside. The steps leading to the house premises shall be within the applicant's premises.
6. The building shall be constructed leaving a clear space in front, behind and on both sides of the building as specified in the plan.
7. The septic tank shall be constructed in the manner of a septic tank.
8. A brick wall not less than 3 feet high shall be constructed around the well. A platform shall be constructed around the well.
9. Adequate arrangements should be made for smoke and light in the upper part of the kitchen.
10. Adequate sewage channels should be constructed to drain the sewage and ensure that no sewage is stored inside the residential premises.
11. The construction of the building should be completed as per the orders of the Tuda Department.
12. The application for renewal of the license should be submitted to the Panchayat Secretary 30 days before the expiry date along with a draft of 40% renewal fee. Failure to do so will result in a fresh license.
13. No building shall be entered into without a sanitation certificate (sanitary certificate) from the Gram Panchayat Secretary.
14. The distance between the electric wires and the house should be ensured without any obstruction as per the electrical regulations.
15. The date of completion of the construction or the date of entry into the house, whichever is earlier, should be informed to the Panchayat Secretary without delay.

Subject : Buildings - Construction - Srinivasapuram Gram Panchayat - Tirupati Rural
Mandal - Survey No. 242 Smt. / Sri K. Pavanivarma
Building construction- Permission orders issued. 3/o Vijayakumararatru
Direction: 1. Application for construction of building No. 7 dated. 20.08.
2. GOMS NO.302M.A & UD .M1Dept .Dated 15/04/2008
3. GOMS NO.67 PR & RD . Dated 26/02/2002
2024
4, Roc.No.1913/G1/2007, DT.15.06.2008 Vice President, Tirupati
Urban Development Corporation, Tirupati .

Srinivasapuram Gram Panchayat
Survey No. 242 GF+1
-
Tirupati Rural Mandal Smt./Shri
K. Pavanivarala
Construction of building. Do Vijayam Kummu Rayu
Orders are hereby issued to approve the following conditions.
1. The construction shall be carried out as per the approved copy plans
2. No changes shall be made to the approved plans without the written permission of the Secretary of the Panchayat.
3. The approved plans shall be produced on request by the officers of the Gram Panchayat.
4. The height of the boundary wall shall not be more than 2 meters above the street level when it abuts a public street.
5. No encroachment shall be made on the roadside. The steps leading to the house premises shall be within the applicant's premises.
6. The building shall be constructed leaving a clear space in front, behind and on both sides of the building as specified in the plan.
7. The boiler room shall be constructed in the septic tank style.
8. A brick wall not less than 3 feet high shall be constructed around the well. A platform shall be constructed around the well.
9. Adequate arrangements shall be made for smoke and light above the kitchen.
10. Adequate sewage channels should be constructed to drain the sewage and adequate provision should be made to prevent sewage from accumulating inside the residence. 
11. The construction of the building should be completed as per the orders of the Tuda Department. 
12. To complete the construction in time, a draft of 40% of the renewal fee should be submitted to the Panchayat Secretary 30 days before the expiry date of the application for renewal of the license. If this is not done, a fresh license should be obtained. 
13. No one should enter the building without obtaining a sanitation certificate or sanitary certificate from the Gram Panchayat Secretary. 
14. As per the electricity regulations, the distance between the electric wires and the house should be ensured. 
15. The date of completion of the construction or the date of entry into the house, whichever is earlier, shall be communicated to the Panchayat Secretary without delay. 16. What right does the applicant have against this order when the place indicated in the plan does not belong to the applicant? 17. The conditions mentioned in the order of the Department No. 125/42/2014 dated 16/07/2014 from No. 34 to 66 shall be strictly followed and no changes or additions to them shall be accepted. 
PANCHAYAT SECRETARY
PINIVASAPURAM GRAMA BANCHAYAT
SURUBAT (R) MANDAL
'M Panchayat
Tirupati Rural Mandal.
Srinivasapuram

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 9680 of 2024, dated 20/Apr/2024, executed by Bandi Uma Kiran, in favour of K. Pavani Varma, Rep. By. Sangaraju Kamala Krishna, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 60 Sq. Yds. (or) 540 Sq. Fts., Located Nearby house number 2-8, Old Ward No. 13, New Ward No. 2, comprised in survey number 242, situated in Tiruchanuru Village, & Gram Panchayat, Srinivasapuram Present Grama Panchayath, Tirupati Rural Mandal, within the District of Tirupati, registered at sub-registrar office Renigunta, is bounded as follows: North by: Executant Sold Site to Chenna Reddy, Subramanyam Reddy South by: Road East by: 30 Feets Wide Road West by: K. Lalithamandakini Sold Site to K. Vijaya Kumar

(A) As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 242, situated in Located Nearby house number 2-8, Old Ward No. 13, New Ward No. 2, Tiruchanur Village measuring about 60 Sq. Yds. (or) 540 Sq. Fts., was originally owned by Bandi Uma Kiran, who acquired the property through vide doc no. 1547/1988, 1880/1988, and 2748/2000.[Ref: Deed & EC.] 2. The aforementioned Bandi Uma Kiran, executed a Sale Deed on 20/Apr/2024, registered as document No. 9680 of 2024, before the SRO Renigunta, in favour of K. Pavani Varma, Rep. By. Sangaraju Kamala Krishna, towards the property measuring 60 Sq. Yds. (or) 540 Sq. Fts., Located Nearby house number 2-8, comprised in survey number 242, Old Ward No. 13, New Ward No. 2, situated in Tiruchanur Village. Note: It is to be noted that, as per the Photographs and Fingerprint page of the given deed, the Claimant K. Pavani Varma, was represented by Sangaraju Kamala Krishna, in the prescribed form, as he was unable to appear before the Sub-Registrar; however, the ownership of the property vests exclusively with the Claimant the F.I. has to verify the same and proceed accordingly. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : It is noted that K Pavani Varma, obtained Building Permission Order issued by Tiruchanur Panchayat Present Secretary, dated 27/Aug/2024, for the construction of the building in schedule property. It is to be noted that the said building needs to be constructed within 30 days from the date of obtaining Permission. Note: It is to be noted that HTR is not insisted upon in this case, when the same is enquired with F.I., to provide HTR towards the schedule property they reverted as the property is newly constructed house. F.I. may proceed as per change in policy norms
Mutation proceeding were not conclude in the name of Current Owner K Pavani Varma.

contentList: Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type
HTR (or) Mutation Proceedings (or) Valuation Report*.....*......*Original (or) Online (or) Photocopy
Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type
MODT* Registered Memorandum of Deposit of Title Deeds to be executed by K. Pavani Varma, in favour of Vistaar Finance towards the schedule property*.....*Original

sections.content:
We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I. policy and have concluded that the K. Pavani Varma, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 60 Sq. Yds. (or) 540 Sq. Fts., Located Nearby house number 2-8, Old Ward No. 13, New Ward No. 2, comprised in survey number 242, situated in Tiruchanuru Village, & Gram Panchayat, Srinivasapuram Present Grama Panchayath, Tirupati Rural Mandal, within the District of Tirupati, registered at sub-registrar office Renigunta.

Further, the current owner, K. Pavani Varma, is to be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant Konduru Chanikya Varma.

Note:It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
